name: Adarkar Sentinel
oracle_text: {1}: Adarkar Sentinel gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We encountered the sentinels in the wastes, near no living thing. Their purpose was inscrutable."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Aeolipile
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Aeolipile: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Although fragile, the aeolipile could be quite destructive."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. I*

name: Ambush Party
oracle_text: First strike, haste
flavor_text:
"Fair fight? I'll take survival over chivalry any day!"
—Tor Wauki, Bandit King

name: Armored Griffin
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance

name: Armor of Faith
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Keep your chainmail, warrior. I have my own form of protection."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

name: Armor Thrull
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Armor Thrull: Put a +1/+2 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"The worst thing about being a mercenary for the Ebon Hand is having to wear a dead thrull."
—Ivra Jursdotter

name: Aurochs
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
flavor_text: One aurochs may feed a village, but a herd will flatten it.

name: Aysen Bureaucrats
oracle_text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 2 or less.
flavor_text:
"I would say that our bureaucrats are no better than vipers—but I shouldn't insult the vipers."
—Murat, death speaker

name: Balduvian Conjurer
oracle_text: {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
flavor_text:
"The very lands of Balduvia are alive."
—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

name: Barbed Sextant
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments, victory was mine."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

name: Brassclaw Orcs
oracle_text: Brassclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.
flavor_text:
"A whole skin is worth a thousand victories."
—Orcish veteran of the Battle of Montford

name: Brine Shaman
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
{1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text:
"The shamans of Marit Lage do her bidding in secret, but they do it gladly."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

name: Carapace
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
Sacrifice Carapace: Regenerate enchanted creature.

name: Cloak of Confusion
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
Whenever enchanted creature attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it assign no combat damage this turn. If you do, defending player discards a card at random.

name: Combat Medic
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text:
"Without combat medics, Icatia would probably not have withstood the forces of chaos as long as it did."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI*

name: Dark Banishing
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"Will not the mountains quake and hills melt at the coming of the darkness? Share this vision with your enemies, Lim-Dûl, and they shall wither."
—Leshrac, Walker of Night

name: Death Spark
oracle_text:
Death Spark deals 1 damage to any target.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew!"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

name: Drift of the Dead
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Drift of the Dead's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow lands you control.
flavor_text:
"Take their dead, and entomb them in the snow. Risen, they shall serve a new purpose."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Dry Spell
oracle_text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text:
"Wherever water is lacking, all things suffer."
—Autumn Willow

name: Elven Lyre
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Elven Lyre: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Scholars are uncertain whether it was the actual sound or some other magical property of the elven lyre that transformed its player.

name: Elvish Hunter
oracle_text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text:
"As the climate cooled, many elves turned to thallid farming for food, while the hunters honed their skills on what little game remained."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. III*

name: Elvish Ranger
flavor_text:
"How can any human hope to match our skills? We are children of Fyndhorn, and its sap runs in our veins."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

name: Enervate
oracle_text:
Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Worlds turn in crucial moments of decision. Make your choice."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

name: Errantry
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and can only attack alone.
flavor_text:
"There is no shame in solitude. The lone knight may succeed where a hundred founder."
—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

name: Essence Flare
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.
flavor_text: Never underestimate the power of the soul unleashed.

name: Feral Thallid
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Feral Thallid.
Remove three spore counters from Feral Thallid: Regenerate Feral Thallid.
flavor_text:
"Born and bred of fungus, thallids were nearly impossible to kill."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. I*

name: Folk of the Pines
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Folk of the Pines gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Our friends of the forest take many forms, yet all serve the will of Freyalise."
—Laina of the Elvish Council

name: Foul Familiar
oracle_text:
Foul Familiar can't block.
{B}, Pay 1 life: Return Foul Familiar to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Serve me, and live forever."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Funeral March
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text:
"This party is such fun—but it's a shame to mourn just one."
—Irini Sengir

name: Gangrenous Zombies
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Gangrenous Zombies: Gangrenous Zombies deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you control a snow Swamp, Gangrenous Zombies deals 2 damage to each creature and each player instead.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Here in Fyndhorn, the goddess Freyalise is generous to her children."
—Kolbjörn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Goblin Ski Patrol
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Goblin Ski Patrol gets +2/+0 and gains flying. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only once and only if you control a snow Mountain.
flavor_text:
"AIIIEEEE!"
—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

name: Icatian Javelineers
oracle_text:
Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it.
{T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: It deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Icatian Phalanx
oracle_text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text: Even after the wall was breached in half a dozen places, the phalanxes fought on, standing solidly against the onrushing raiders. Disciplined and dedicated, they held their ranks to the end, even in the face of tremendous losses.

name: Icatian Scout
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Because the orc hordes attacked along the entire border, Scouts were essential to Icatia's defense."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI*

name: Icequake
oracle_text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, Icequake deals 1 damage to that land's controller.
flavor_text:
"When the earth shakes, and their animals are swallowed up by the ground, perhaps they will think twice before attacking again."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Icy Prison
oracle_text:
When Icy Prison enters the battlefield, exile target creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Icy Prison unless any player pays {3}.
When Icy Prison leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Incinerate
oracle_text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor_text:
"Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Ironclaw Orcs
oracle_text: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.
flavor_text: Generations of genetic weeding have given rise to the deviously cowardly Ironclaw clan.

name: Kjeldoran Dead
oracle_text:
When Kjeldoran Dead enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
{B}: Regenerate Kjeldoran Dead.
flavor_text:
"They shall kill those whom once they loved."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Kjeldoran Elite Guard
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Elite Guard. Activate only during combat.
flavor_text: The winged helms of the guard are put on for pageants—but taken off for war.

name: Kjeldoran Skycaptain
oracle_text: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text:
"If we do our duty and uphold our honor, Kjeldor shall stand for a thousand years."
—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

name: Krovikan Fetish
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Krovikan Fetish enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
flavor_text: Some Krovikans find strength in the ears and eyes of their victims and wear such fetishes into battle.

name: Krovikan Sorcerer
oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a nonblack card: Draw a card.
{T}, Discard a black card: Draw two cards, then discard one of them.
flavor_text:
"These sorcerers always seem to have another surprise up their sleeves."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Lat-Nam's Legacy
oracle_text: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"All the knowledge of Lat-Nam could not protect its sages from the Brothers' War."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Leaping Lizard
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Leaping Lizard gets -0/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I never question the Autumn Willow about her motives, not even when she turns people into lizards. It's her way."
—Devin, faerie noble

name: Meteor Shower
oracle_text: Meteor Shower deals X plus 1 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text:
"Eenie, meenie, minie, moe . . . oh, why not all of them?"
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Necrite
oracle_text: Whenever Necrite attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature defending player controls. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: Necrites killed Jherana Rure, ending the counterinsurgency.

name: Orcish Conscripts
oracle_text:
Orcish Conscripts can't attack unless at least two other creatures attack.
Orcish Conscripts can't block unless at least two other creatures block.

name: Orcish Farmer
oracle_text: {T}: Target land becomes a Swamp until its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text:
"Yes, the farmers keep our soldiers fed. But why do they have to make every battlefield a pigpen?"
—Toothlicker Harj, orcish captain

name: Orcish Lumberjack
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}.
flavor_text:
"How did I ever let myself get talked into this project?"
—Toothlicker Harj, orcish captain

name: Orcish Veteran
oracle_text:
Orcish Veteran can't block white creatures with power 2 or greater.
{R}: Orcish Veteran gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: Unsuccessful in their early battle for Montford, the orcs quickly tempered their bloodlust with cowardice.

name: Panic
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"If you'd been there, you would've run from that deer, too!"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Phantasmal Fiend
oracle_text:
{B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Phantasmal Mount
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target creature you control with toughness 2 or less gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. When Phantasmal Mount leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice that creature. When the creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Phantasmal Mount.

name: Portent
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Red Cliffs Armada
oracle_text: Red Cliffs Armada can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: By the battle of Red Cliffs in the year 208, the Wu kingdom controlled more than seven thousand warships on the Yangtze.

name: Reinforcements
oracle_text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text:
"Let them send their legions! I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords."
—General Varchild

name: Reprisal
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran priest

name: Roterothopter
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}: Roterothopter gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.
flavor_text:
"The roterothoper is as insidious as it is ingenious. It is one of the few creations of our school that I take no pride in."
—Baki, wizard attendant

name: Royal Trooper
oracle_text: Whenever Royal Trooper blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Fortune does not side with the fainthearted."
—Sophocles, Phaedra

name: Screeching Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
When Screeching Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Shield Bearer
oracle_text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text:
"You have almost completed your four years, my son. Soon you shall be a skyknight."
—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

name: Shrink
oracle_text: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Do not fear adversity. Let your courage be your strength."
—Onatah, Anaba shaman

name: Shyft
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Shyft become the color or colors of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor_text:
"Capturing this specimen was not easy. Study it well, that you someday might be as versatile."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Songs of the Damned
oracle_text: Add {B} for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Not wind, but the breath of the dead.

name: Stonehands
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Trust in the power of stone. Stone is strong; stone shatters swords; stone breaks bones. Trust in stone."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Thallid
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid.
Remove three spore counters from Thallid: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

name: Thallid Devourer
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Devourer.
Remove three spore counters from Thallid Devourer: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Sacrifice a Saproling: Thallid Devourer gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

name: Thermokarst
oracle_text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Finally we understand the lesson of our home: loss begets renewal."
—Kolbjörn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Tinder Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R}.
{R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: It deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

name: Varchild's Crusader
oracle_text: {0}: Varchild's Crusader can't be blocked this turn except by Walls. Sacrifice Varchild's Crusader at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"Every patch of land must belong to Kjeldor, no matter what the cost!"
—General Varchild

name: Viscerid Armor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{1}{U}: Return Viscerid Armor to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: A fallen viscerid's only tribute is to be worn by a comrade.

name: Wall of Kelp
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{U}{U}, {T}: Create a 0/1 blue Plant Wall creature token with defender named Kelp.
flavor_text:
"Ya can eat it or ya can weave it, but ya can't fight in it."
—Zeki, reef pirate

name: Warning
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
flavor_text:
"The folk of the Karplusan mountains are impossible to ambush."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Whiteout
oracle_text:
All creatures lose flying until end of turn.
Sacrifice a snow land: Return Whiteout from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Woolly Mammoths
oracle_text: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.
flavor_text:
"Mammoths may be good to ride on, but they're certainly bad to fall off of!"
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Zuran Spellcaster
oracle_text: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever."
—Zur the Enchanter
